title: Vasundhara Flat Rent
content: I am looking to rent out 2Bhk flat in Vasundhara Krithika but the guard told me that all flats are occupied. Is anyone here in final or any year who’s leaving or moving out from there?

comments.body:
You seem to be a little off-time when it comes to booking at Vasundhara. There are usually 2 time slots during which people book:

1. November end - December: Most final year students move out for internship and move closer to their offices in different parts of the city (or country). 
2. June-July: Students move out looking for other accommodation options or final years moving out early. You are a little late to enquire about this.

You can try asking the broker/owner who is in charge of those flats directly, instead of the guard. They will be more aware of when tenants will leave.

I am gonna be Starting my PG course this August, that’s why i started looking now, also how do i find broker / owner? I came to Bangalore to finalise my stay and i am here for 2 more days. If you have contact details could you please share it. Thank you
Hey man, I’m actually looking for a flatmate (it’s not in Vasundhara, but it’s around 3kms from PES). DM if you want more info!
